English.Text: Be the first to build the grand Botanical Gardens of the era: dreamlands of sinuous trees, impossible colour and scented blooms imported from afar. Send out botanical expeditions, or take the botanical craze to your World's Fair to get your hands on the rarest specimens to complete all the garden sets and inspire new applications of botany â€” such as extended fertilities! Let your Botanical Garden blossom with the new pathway ornaments and revel in classic Anno themes with the new Music Pavilion.
